description:
Your Injury Lawyer In Greenville

At Southeastern Law Group PA, we are completely dedicated to helping you and your family recover the full amount of compensation you deserve for your injury or loss caused by someone else's negligence or wrongdoing.

Serving The Upstate For Years

Our law firm has two offices in upstate South Carolina, including our law office in Greenville, each providing convenient access to the highest level of advocacy and support you deserve for your personal injury or wrongful death claims resulting from a motor vehicle accident, a defective product, a slip-and-fall accident or any other type of preventable tragedy.

Experienced attorney David L. Moore manages our practice, and he has achieved notable success fighting on behalf of innocent accident victims, recovering substantial settlements and awards for those he has served and earning his reputation as one of the top trial lawyers in the region.

We Are Here For You

Regardless of how complex or challenging your case, you can trust us to do what is necessary to help you obtain the maximum amount possible so that you can focus on your recovery, and we will never require a fee from you unless we secure finances on your behalf.

You do not have to suffer alone. By contacting Southeastern Law Group PA and taking advantage of our law firm's free initial consultation, you can begin the process of obtaining the justice you seek.
